attributes.action: Cancell the 2012 London Olympics due to the spiraling costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rising costs of staging the olympics just are not acceptable and will do little to promote the country as a sporting nation, but more so as a laughing stock and one that has no grip on keeping to budget and timescale. Look at Wembley stadium and the ill fated Dome as an example, surely these over budget and late finishing projects should be enough to say stop and save the money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
